alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 3:40PM MDT until April 28 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Moody County in east central South Dakota... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 438 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Colman, or 16 miles south of Brookings, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 425 PM CDT, half dollar sized hail was reported 5 miles north-northwest of Colman. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Flandreau around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
